LanguageData.MakeKibble.label: make kibble
LanguageData.MakeKibble.description: Make animal kibble by combining raw meat and plants.
LanguageData.MakePemmican.label: make pemmican
LanguageData.MakePemmican.description: Make pemmican, a preserved combination of meat and plant food. It doesn't taste amazing, but lasts a year without refrigeration.
